Discord

The channels and actvities of our Discord.

Novice

I dont know ANY Korean.

Beginner

I know how to read, maybe some basic grammar and words.

Intermediate

I know a decent amount of grammar and vocabulary and want to learn more.

Advanced

I know a lot of Korean and want improve in a particular area.
